author: simion314
message: Great work,can we have packages for precise in the PPA or other way to get latest version in 12.04? I am using latest KDe 4.10 from kubuntu's KDE backports PPA.

author: Marcus Lohse
message: *.deb packages for Precise and Quantal would be fantastic! Many thanks for your work!

author: MattMcHackit
message: Cool! Will the icon for this version scale if you change the size of the panel it's on? Only think I don't like about previous versions is that it doesn't. Look forward to trying it!

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: The icon does not scale for now, but it would make sense. Please file a bug report!
